subject: Re: Confirming Updated Fixes for Diesellink
preview: Hi Erin,  Thank you so much for sending through the PDF—really helpful!  We’ve now updated the documents so they reflect Diesel Link (not RFS) and simplified the language to make things as clear a

full_threads.body:
Hi Erin,

Thank you so much for sending through the PDF—really helpful!

We’ve now updated the documents so they reflect Diesel Link (not RFS) and simplified the language to make things as clear and customer-friendly as possible.

Here’s are some updates:
Privacy Policy
  • View Google Doc
  • Privacy Policy
Terms and Conditions
  • View Google Doc
  • Terms and Condition

Feel free to review and make any edits directly in the docs.

Once you and Alex are happy with them, just let us know and we’ll lock them in.

Let me know if there's anything else you need in the meantime—always happy to help!

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Allie Borcena
Daphne Bautista assigned to Andy Crebar
Allie Borcena assigned to Daphne Bautista

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Erin,

Thank you so much for sending those through—and really appreciate your patience.

We're so sorry for the inconvenience this has caused.

Just a quick heads-up: we've fixed the typos on the page, and our developer is currently working on the Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions page to make sure everything reflects Diesel Link’s branding and content.

We’ll send over a draft version shortly for you and Alex to review.

Let me know if there’s anything else you need in the meantime—always happy to help.

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Glen Tenorio
Allie Borcena assigned to Cindy Valderama

full_threads.body:
Hi Daphne,

Thanks so much for speaking with me regarding the changes that need to be made.

For the website - the privacy policy/terms and conditions need to be clear and simple so our customers understand Diesel Link's Terms and Conditions of Sale and our Privacy Policy.

As discussed, I've attached the draft examples for the Terms and Conditions (the terms/privacy need to show Diesel Link not RFS). These files are in a pdf and docx format.

Please send over a draft version for Alex and I to take a look at and we will let you know.

Thanks Daphne

Kind regards,

______________________________________

Erin McGarry

Accounts Manager

Diesel Link Pty Ltd 0452 151 109

PO BOX 4023 PENRITH NSW 2750 http://www.diesellink.com.au/

ABN: 66 630 672 105
